name: Susie Wolff
introduction: OccupationTeam CEOEmployerVenturi Formula E TeamYears active20182022OccupationManaging DirectorEmployerF1 AcademyYears active2023Suzanne "Susie" Wolff MBE (born Suzanne Stoddart on December 6, 1982) is a Formula One driver from Oban, Scotland. She was formerly a test driver at Williams. She is also the wife of Mercedes Formula One Team Principal and CEO, Toto Wolff,[1] who was formerly a shareholder in the Williams team.[2]
